79815.ゲーム画面を表示する、ウィンドウのモードを設定します。\n - 通常ウィンドウモ:
Sets the screen type for gameplay.
・Windowed Mode
         - Adjusts the size of the game window to the resolution set in "Screen Resolution".
・Exclusive Full Screen Mode
         - The game screen will fit to the size of the display.
         - You can configure the screen resolution for this mode.
         - Your mouse will be locked to the game's window.
・Virtual Full Screen Mode (Borderless Windowed Mode)
         - The game window will maximize to the size of your current display resolution.
         - Your mouse will not be locked to the game's window.
         - Screen resolution cannot be configured for this setting.
※Settings will take effect on a restart of the game.

        - Enables this behavior with a potential hit on performance.
・Unchecked
        - Disables this behavior.

Sets the behavior of the screen saver and power settings during gameplay.

  It will also be enabled during gameplay.
  However, when in "Full Screen Mode", this is disabled regardless.
  - Unchecked

※ This item will not take effect until you restart the game.

79820.ゲームプレイ中の最大フレームレートを設定します。\n - 30fps\n 処:
Sets the maximum frame rate during gameplay.

  - 60fps
  The screen display will be smoother, but processing load will increase.

79822.グラフィックスの品質を一括で設定します。\n - 最高品質\n グラフィック:
Sets the graphic quality.
  - Highest Quality
   Displays the graphics nicely, but increases processing load.
  - Standard Quality
 The setting strikes a good balance between graphics and processing.
  - Low Quality
  Coarser graphics, but reduced load.
 ※Will not take effect until a game restart.

79823.ゲーム画面に一度に表示できる、オブジェクト（キャラクターなど）の量を設定します。:

In some cases, processing may become heavy.
This may stabilize operations.

  Processing load will increase.
  - Standard Quality
  Strikes a good balance between quality and load.

 -No Limit

 -Normal
